info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 10:49PM CDT until June 14 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1049 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Riverdale, or 10 miles north of Kearney, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pleasanton around 1100 PM CDT. Poole around 1105 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Ravenna. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
